description: Manage linked storage account for an Application Insights component.

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component linked-storage link
commands.summary: Link a storage account with an     Application Insights component.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component linked-storage link --storage-account
                                                      [--app]
                                                      [--ids]
                                                      [--resource-group]
                                                      [--subscription]

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component linked-storage show
commands.summary: Get the current linked storage settings for an Application Insights component.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component linked-storage show [--app]
                                                      [--ids]
                                                      [--resource-group]
                                                      [--subscription]

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component linked-storage unlink
commands.summary: Unlink a storage account with an Application Insights component.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component linked-storage unlink [--app]
                                                        [--ids]
                                                        [--resource-group]
                                                        [--subscription]
                                                        [--yes]

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component linked-storage update
commands.summary: Update current linked storage account for an Application Insights component.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component linked-storage update --storage-account
                                                        [--app]
                                                        [--ids]
                                                        [--resource-group]
                                                        [--subscription]
